testcase.name: Grant an access token with all permissions on all resource types with authorized uuid
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given the authorized UUID "test-authorized-uuid"............................passed Given the TTL 60............................................................passed Given the 'channel-1' CHANNEL resource access permissions...................passed * grant resource permission READ............................................passed * grant resource permission WRITE...........................................passed * grant resource permission GET.............................................passed * grant resource permission MANAGE..........................................passed * grant resource permission UPDATE..........................................passed * grant resource permission JOIN............................................passed * grant resource permission DELETE..........................................passed Given the 'channel_group-1' CHANNEL_GROUP resource access permissions.......passed * grant resource permission READ............................................passed * grant resource permission MANAGE..........................................passed Given the 'uuid-1' UUID resource access permissions.........................passed * grant resource permission GET.............................................passed * grant resource permission UPDATE..........................................passed * grant resource permission DELETE..........................................passed Given the '^channel-\S*$' CHANNEL pattern access permissions................passed * grant pattern permission READ.............................................passed * grant pattern permission WRITE............................................passed * grant pattern permission GET..............................................passed * grant pattern permission MANAGE...........................................passed * grant pattern permission UPDATE...........................................passed * grant pattern permission JOIN.............................................passed * grant pattern permission DELETE...........................................passed Given the '^:channel_group-\S*$' CHANNEL_GROUP pattern access permissions...passed * grant pattern permission READ.............................................passed * grant pattern permission MANAGE...........................................passed Given the '^uuid-\S*$' UUID pattern access permissions......................passed * grant pattern permission GET..............................................passed * grant pattern permission UPDATE...........................................passed * grant pattern permission DELETE...........................................passed When I grant a token specifying those permissions...........................passed Then the token contains the authorized UUID "test-authorized-uuid"..........passed Then the token contains the TTL 60..........................................passed Then the token has 'channel-1' CHANNEL resource access permissions..........passed * token resource permission READ............................................passed * token resource permission WRITE...........................................passed * token resource permission GET.............................................passed * token resource permission MANAGE..........................................passed * token resource permission UPDATE..........................................passed * token resource permission JOIN............................................passed * token resource permission DELETE..........................................passed Then the token has 'channel_group-1' CHANNEL_GROUP resource access permissions.passed * token resource permission READ............................................passed * token resource permission MANAGE..........................................passed Then the token has 'uuid-1' UUID resource access permissions................passed * token resource permission GET.............................................passed * token resource permission UPDATE..........................................passed * token resource permission DELETE..........................................passed Then the token has '^channel-\S*$' CHANNEL pattern access permissions.......passed * token pattern permission READ.............................................passed * token pattern permission WRITE............................................passed * token pattern permission token pattern permission DELETE...........................................passed

testcase.name: Grant an access token without an authorized uuid
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given the TTL 60............................................................passed Given the 'channel-1' CHANNEL resource access permissions...................passed * grant resource permission READ............................................passed When I grant a token specifying those permissions...........................passed Then the token contains the TTL 60..........................................passed Then the token does not contain an authorized uuid..........................passed Then the token has 'channel-1' CHANNEL resource access permissions..........passed * token resource permission READ............................................passed

testcase.name: Grant an access token successfully with an authorized uuid
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given the authorized UUID "test-authorized-uuid"............................passed Given the TTL 60............................................................passed Given the 'channel-1' CHANNEL resource access permissions...................passed * grant resource permission READ............................................passed When I grant a token specifying those permissions...........................passed Then the token contains the TTL 60..........................................passed Then the token contains the authorized UUID "test-authorized-uuid"..........passed Then the token has 'channel-1' CHANNEL resource access permissions..........passed * token resource permission READ............................................passed

testcase.name: Attempt to grant an access token with all permissions empty or false and expect a server error
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given the TTL 60............................................................passed Given the 'uuid-1' UUID resource access permissions.........................passed * deny resource permission GET..............................................passed When I attempt to grant a token specifying those permissions................passed Then an error is returned...................................................passed * the error status code is 400..............................................passed * the error message is 'Invalid permissions'................................passed * the error source is 'grant'...............................................passed * the error detail message is 'Unexpected value: `permissions.resources.uuids.uuid-1` must be positive and non-zero.'.passed * the error detail location is 'permissions.resources.uuids.uuid-1'.........passed * the error detail location type is 'body'..................................passed

testcase.name: Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing a syntax error and expect a server error
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given the TTL 60............................................................passed Given the '!<[^>]+>++' UUID pattern access permissions......................passed * grant pattern permission GET..............................................passed When I attempt to grant a token specifying those permissions................passed Then an error is returned...................................................passed * the error status code is 400..............................................passed * the error message is 'Invalid RegExp'.....................................passed * the error source is 'grant'...............................................passed * the error detail message is 'Syntax error: multiple repeat.'..............passed * the error detail location is 'permissions.patterns.uuids.!<[^>]+>++'......passed * the error detail location type is 'body'..................................passed

testcase.name: Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing capturing groups and expect a server error
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given the TTL 60............................................................passed Given the '(!<[^>]+>)+' UUID pattern access permissions.....................passed * grant pattern permission GET..............................................passed When I attempt to grant a token specifying those permissions................passed Then an error is returned...................................................passed * the error status code is 400..............................................passed * the error message is 'Invalid RegExp'.....................................passed * the error source is 'grant'...............................................passed * the error detail message is 'Only non-capturing groups are allowed. Try replacing `(` with `(?:`.'.passed * the error detail location is 'permissions.patterns.uuids.(!<[^>]+>)+'.....passed * the error detail location type is 'body'..................................passed

testcase.name: Validate that a token containing authorized uuid can be parsed correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given I have a known token containing an authorized UUID....................passed When I parse the token......................................................passed Then the parsed token output contains the authorized UUID "test-authorized-uuid".passed

testcase.name: Validate that a token containing uuid resource permissions can be parsed correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given I have a known token containing UUID resource permissions.............passed When I parse the token......................................................passed Then the token has 'uuid-1' UUID resource access permissions................passed * token resource permission GET.............................................passed

testcase.name: Validate that a token containing uuid pattern permissions can be parsed correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I have a keyset with access manager enabled...........................passed Given I have a known token containing UUID pattern Permissions..............passed When I parse the token......................................................passed Then the token has '^uuid-\S*$' UUID pattern access permissions.............passed * token pattern permission GET..............................................passed
